title: Elvis Costello
summary: Declan Patrick McManus, OBE (born 25 August 1954),[6] known professionally as Elvis Costello, is an English singer-songwriter. He has won multiple awards in his career, including Grammy Awards in 1999 and 2020,[7] and has twice been nominated for the Brit Award for Best British Male Artist.[8] In 2003, he was inducted into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame.[9] In 2004, Rolling Stone ranked Costello number 80 on its list of the 100 Greatest Artists of All Time.[10]
